channel.title: Networking on Systology
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on Systology

item.title: Chowist
item.description: Monolithic Django app for place listings; focus on production hardening: static serving, background jobs, connection pooling, and CI/CD.

item.title: Distributed Web Crawler
item.description: Design for a Google-scale web crawler focusing on Breadth-First Search (BFS), DNS resolution caching, robots.txt politeness, and handling duplicate or malicious domains.

item.title: End-to-End Migration & Deduplication
item.description: System design for migrating large datasets with deduplication, integrity checks, resumability, and idempotence.

item.title: Global CDN Media Serving
item.description: CDN-backed media delivery architecture for low-latency, highly-available global media serving with background upload processing.

item.title: Mailprune
item.description: Local-first email auditing and cleanup tool that identifies noisy senders and produces privacy-preserving recommendations.

item.title: Networking & Services
item.description: Practical guidance for API contracts, retries/backoff, rate limiting, timeouts, connection pooling, service discovery, auth, serialization, and TLS.

item.title: Photohaul
item.description: Java tool for organizing and migrating large photo collections with deduplication, metadata preservation, and resumable jobs.

item.title: Service Resilience
item.description: Patterns for reliable service behavior: idempotency, async IO, circuit breakers, background job queues, and observability.

item.title: URL Shortener & Pastebin
item.description: Design for a highly available, read-heavy service bridging short aliases to long URLs, focusing on Base62 encoding, Snowflake IDs, and collision avoidance.
